project.bocss.description: A library with a suite of tools to generate a stylesheet from javascript TemplateString
project.bocss.feature.1: Sharing of variables between JS and CSS
project.bocss.feature.2: Possible reduction of the size of the sources
project.translations.description: From a catalog of translations allow translation in JS.
project.translations.feature.1: Sharing of translation catalogs between frontend and backend
project.pixelart.description: A web app that allows you to make pixel art.
project.pixelart.feature.2: Export in various image formats and in CSS
